About me

A little about myself

BIO

Full disclosure: I am a computer geek. I love computers and have a passion for software and coding. When I am not coding I am reading code blogs or going to developer meetups. I am always excited to try a new library or framework especially in the mobile or web development space.

Currently - I am working on a project to strengthen my AngularJS and MEAN stack programming skills.
